It is also very clear that the federal government, under his leadership, is doing an exceptionally poor job of coordinating the reunification process.
It is very apparent that President Trump and his administration still have no real plan for how to reunite these children, and the thousands of other children separated from their families.

While CA has regulations in place to ensure basic care/accommodations are provided‚Äî& caregivers within this particular facility were doing their best to help children‚Äîthere's no guarantee that children separated from parents & housed in other states will receive same treatment.

I witnessed the gut-wrenching sight of children who were cruelly separated from their parents by the President of the United States, through no fault of their own, and with no assurance if or when they will be reunited with their families.
